name: Fiberlock Technologies Piranha NexStrip - 5700
description: Fiberlock Technologies Piranha NexStrip - 5700 is the next generation water based paint and coating remover. The unique paste formulation clings to and tenaciously attacks multiple layers of almost any coating system. Easy to work with and easy to clean up, Piranha NexStrip does not contain methylene chloride, methanol, chlorinated solvents, caustics or petroleum-based solvents. It can be used on interior and exterior surfaces including concrete, brick, stone, aluminum, wood, fiberglass, plastic and other surfaces.
